unauthorized.title: 403 - Access Denied
unauthorized.message: You do not have permission to view this page.

routesConfig.sessionRestoreError: Failed to restore session. Please log in again.

login.signInMessage: Sign in to start your session
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

login.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.
